name: Lovely Handmade Christmas Cards - Set of 5
description:
Five original card designs, made from cut vinyl. All come in a lovely gift box. Cards measure 135mm x 135mm. Provided with envelopes and left blank inside or your own message. You have;

Roland Robin
Prancing Reindeer
Strong Firs
Stringed Stockings
Bouncy Baubles

Enjoy!

name: Lovely Christmas Decorations Gift Box!
description:
Six perspex disc decorations of different designs, all available in this lovely gift box! The box consistes of;

Star
Fir Tree
Bow
Snowflake
Reindeer
Candy Cane

The discs are 70mm diameter and 5mm thick. All discs come with ribbon loop.

name: Primrosie Silhouette Lampshade 10"/25cm Diameter
description:
Beautiful hidden silhouette lampshade design inspired by a vintage wallpaper design! when the shade is off it looks plain, but when you switch the light on there's a nice surprise!

Available in a choice of 6 colours and various sizes. Please choose from the drop down menus below. Height of shades is 20cm. If you would like a different height please email me before you buy and I can alter the shade. Other shade sizes also available.

Please note;  The direction of the design is altered according to either standing lamps or pendant lamps so please make sure you specify the correct orientation.

Please also note that the smaller the shade, the less of the design.

All shades made to order. Custom designs possible, along with larger shade diameter. Just email us and we can have a natter about it :). Please allow 10 working days for delivery.
